title: Game Awards: Beefs Up Security, Removes World Premieres - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.27.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com – Black Friday sale active from 11/17 – 11/30 and deal auto applies.

Tim and Blessing talk about Geoff Keighley's comments on Best Independent Game, removing World Premiere from Game Awards, and tightening up security.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:12:56 - Housekeeping
 - Ever wondered how weird Greg was as a kid? Well, now we have a definitive answer.
    - The first episode of Greg's Childhood Home Videos is live right now on YouTube.com/KindaFunny. If you enjoy it, all episodes are live right now over on Patreon.com/KindaFunny!
     -  The Roper Report   -
00:16:36 - Game Awards is moving away from ‘World Premiere’
00:28:34 - The Game Awards security will be tightened to prevent another stage invasion, Geoff Keighley says
00:33:09 - The Game Awards has considered adding Best Remake and Best Supporting Actor awards
00:41:32 - Keighley weighs in on debate over Dave the Diver qualifying for Best Indie Game
00:45:28 - ReedPop seeks buyer for Eurogamer, GI, VG247, Rock Paper Shotgun and more
00:53:02 - ByteDance is restructuring its video games business
00:56:36 - Destiny 2 The Final Shape Expansion has been pushed
01:00:06 - Out Today
01:01:31 - You‘re Wrong
01:04:53 - The Post Show!
